DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to estimate the effect of oral Boniva (ibandronate sodium)taken once monthly versus placebo on bone quality and strength at the hip at one year.
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Assess The Quality Of Bone In Patients Taking Oral Ibandronate Versus Placebo
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Ambulatory, postmenopausal women who are diagnosed with osteoporosis. Must be able to stand or sit upright for at least 60 minutes and swallow a tablet whole. Exclusion criteria: Have been treated with other bisphosphonates or using chronic steroids within the past 6 months. Have a history of major upper GI diseases or have severe kidney dysfunction. Have a spine fracture (identified on xray).
